short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: File Picker Extension. Helps you pick files directly from your iManage account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hamisha: A seamless way to upload documents directly from  iManage to any website
 
Hamisha empowers you to effortlessly upload documents or links to documents in iManage directly from iManage to any website.

KEY FEATURES:
●	 Direct Uploads: Transfer documents OR even their links directly from iManage to any website, bypassing the need to first download them to your device.
●	Batch Uploading: Why upload one when you can upload many? Hamisha supports multiple document uploads simultaneously.
●	Format Flexibility: With Hamisha, you have the choice! Upload documents in their original format or easily opt to convert them into PDFs on the fly before uploading.
●	User-Friendly: Intuitive design ensures a smooth experience, even for those not tech-savvy.
●	Safety Assured: With Hamisha, document security is paramount. Rely on a trustworthy and dependable extension.

HOW HAMISHA ELEVATES YOUR WORK:
●	Time-Saver: Say goodbye to the cumbersome process of downloading files from iManage just to re-upload them to another website. With Hamisha, the middle step is eliminated, streamlining your workflow.
●	Boost Productivity: Hamisha minimizes the manual steps involved in downloading, potentially converting to PDF, and re-uploading documents. Simplify your tasks and elevate your efficiency with this seamless integration.
●	Accuracy Matters: Reduce chances of errors like uploading wrong documents.
●	Compliance & Security: Maintain the integrity of your documents and adhere to compliance standards.

GETTING STARTED WITH HAMISHA:
1.	Download and install Hamisha from the Chrome Web Store.
2.	Navigate to your desired website for document upload.
3.	Click on the Hamisha icon located in the Chrome toolbar.
4.	Browse and select the necessary documents from iManage.
5.	Hit the "Upload" button and let Hamisha handle the rest.

EXPERIENCE THE HAMISHA DIFFERENCE TODAY!
Transform the way you manage document uploads from iManage to any website. With Hamisha, convenience, speed, and security are at your fingertips.. 

For more details, reach out to us at info@mkenga.com 

Mkenga Na Namwaka, Inc (based in Chicago) is a certified iManage implementation partners and a registered iManage independent software vendor (ISV)
